name: Rock Concert
description: Experience the energy of the best rock bands in the world in the heart of Belgrade. Food, drinks, and merchandise will be available for purchase. Tickets are $25.

name: Business Seminar
description: Learn from the best in the business world at this seminar in Novi Sad. Featuring keynote speakers, workshops, and networking opportunities, this event is a must-attend for entrepreneurs and professionals. Registration is $50.

name: Art Festival
description: Explore the diversity of contemporary art at this festival in Kragujevac. Featuring exhibitions, performances, and workshops by local and international artists, this event is a celebration of creativity. Admission is free.

name: Car Rally
description: Watch the most powerful cars in action as they race through the stunning landscapes of Novi Pazar. This rally is a thrilling experience for car enthusiasts and adrenaline junkies alike. Admission is free.

name: Serbian Music Festival
description: Come and enjoy the best of Serbian music at our annual festival featuring local artists and performers.

name: Business Networking Seminar
description: Join us for an afternoon of networking and professional development with top business leaders and experts.

name: International Food Festival
description: Discover a world of flavors at our food festival featuring cuisine from around the globe.

name: Art Exhibition
description: Experience the beauty and creativity of local artists at our art exhibition showcasing a variety of styles and mediums.

name: Serbian National Basketball Tournament
description: Cheer on your favorite teams and players at the biggest basketball tournament in Serbia featuring top talent from across the country.

name: Serbian Business Summit
description: A gathering of business professionals and entrepreneurs to discuss the latest trends and developments in the Serbian business landscape.

name: Belgrade Jazz Festival
description: A celebration of jazz music with performances by local and international musicians.

name: Novi Sad Film Festival
description: A showcase of the best in contemporary cinema from around the world.

name: Serbian Food & Wine Festival
description: An opportunity to sample some of the best food and wine that Serbia has to offer.

name: Belgrade Fashion Week
description: A showcase of the latest trends and designs in the world of fashion.

name: Autumn Music Festival
description: A celebration of the season with live music performances from local artists.

name: Business Networking Lunch
description: An opportunity for entrepreneurs and business professionals to connect and share ideas over a meal.

name: Art Exhibition Opening
description: A showcase of new works by local artists, featuring paintings, sculptures, and mixed media pieces.

name: Technology Conference
description: A gathering of tech enthusiasts, featuring keynote speakers and breakout sessions covering the latest trends and innovations.

name: Serbian National Football Match
description: Cheer on the Serbian national team as they take on a rival squad in this exciting football match.
